'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
One of many storage towers inside [[Hasongo]], this one was used by survivors of the initial destruction as shelter from the naga that attacked in Eothas' wake.

==Points of interest==
* This is a single room with the survivors huddling against the naga outside. [[Zuhira]] stands amidst them, leading the survivors.

==Characters==
* [[Zuhira]]
title: Storage tower
